channel.title: I need help with a new server
channel.description: i download no-ip duc and i put in my email and password and i click the box. i download the jdk i need! i set the path and classpath environment variable! i tried to turn on server but ain't working. and how do i make a client go straight to my ip address? please help fast![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2009, 07:06:07 pm[/size][hr]when i tried to turn on server. the run thing came but it blank cmd. nothing in it.

so wtf do i do??? please helllppppppppp

item.source: I need help with a new server

item.title: I need help with a new server
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

rip4d:

You need to run a server on a wired computer (desktop typically). Otherwise it won’t be available for the public. The same thing happened to me. I set it up again on my desktop, and voila, it worked.

Actually, not. I ran my first ever server on my laptop, with a wireless connection to a Linksys router. It worked just as fine, except at one person’s house, the router reset itself every time I port forwarded to any port. I was able to have a great number of players (for the time) on at once. No problem.

@topic What do you mean your run was blank?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a new server
